short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect to Instagram DM from Threads profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Threads experience with the Threads Chat Button for Instagram extension. This tool adds a convenient chat icon next to each username on Threads, allowing you to initiate direct conversations with users on Instagram effortlessly.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration: Instantly access Instagram Direct Messaging from Threads with a single click.
User-Friendly Interface: The chat icon is intuitively placed beside usernames for easy navigation.
Time-Saving: Streamline your communication by connecting directly with users without leaving Threads.
Note: Ensure you're logged into your Instagram account to utilize the direct messaging feature.

Elevate your social interactions on Threads with the Threads Chat Button for Instagram, making your conversations more accessible and efficient.
